en.title: Monthly Kitten Growth Guide | Development from 1 to 12 Months
en.content:
Kittens grow at an astonishing rate. Knowing the developmental milestones for each month helps you provide appropriate care.

Month-by-Month Guide

1 Month Old

Weight: 300-500g. Eyes open, ears begin to stand, and the kitten starts toddling. Mother's milk is still the main food source.

2 Months Old

Weight: 600g-1kg. Weaning is complete and litter training begins. This is the middle of the socialization period, and playing with siblings is important.

3 Months Old

Weight: 1.2-2kg. Very active and curious. Time for the first vaccination. This is a suitable age for adoption.

4-6 Months Old

Weight: 2-4kg. Permanent teeth start replacing baby teeth. Activity levels peak. Time to consider spaying or neutering.

7-12 Months Old

Weight: 3.5-7kg. The body approaches adult size, though Siberians take 3 to 5 years to fully mature.

zh.title: 小猫月龄成长指南 | 1至12个月的发育过程
zh.content:
小猫的成长速度令人惊叹。了解每个月龄的发育标准，有助于提供恰当的照顾。

月龄指南

1个月

体重：300-500g。眼睛睁开，耳朵开始竖起，开始蹒跚学步。母乳仍是主要食物来源。

2个月

体重：600g-1kg。断奶完成，开始学习使用猫厕所。正处于社会化关键期，与兄弟姐妹的玩耍非常重要。

3个月

体重：1.2-2kg。非常活跃，好奇心旺盛。第一次疫苗接种的时期。进入适合领养的月龄。

4-6个月

体重：2-4kg。恒牙开始替换乳牙。活动量达到高峰。可以考虑绝育手术。

7-12个月

体重：3.5-7kg。体型接近成猫，但西伯利亚猫需要3至5年才能完全成熟。
